sentences.en: Political changes in eastern Europe opened the floodgates to thousands of people who wished to emigrate.
sentences.cn: 东欧的政治剧变打开了移民的泄洪闸,成千上万的人急于移民他国。

sentences.en: The discussion sessions allow people to open the floodgates to their deepest fears.
sentences.cn: 这些讨论会使人们尽情倾诉心中的恐惧。
